title: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Classic Italian pasta with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
instructions: Whisk eggs with parmesan and pepper.
Mix pasta with pancetta and egg mixture off heat.

title: Chicken Curry
description: A flavorful curry with tender chicken and aromatic spices.
instructions: Add chicken and cook until browned.
Pour in coconut milk and simmer until chicken is tender.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: Crispy on the edges, chewy in the middle – the perfect cookie.
instructions: Add dry ingredients and mix until combined.
Scoop onto baking tray and bake 10–12 minutes.
